name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Face & Neck Serum, Fast-Absorbing Daily Facial Moisturizer with Purified Hyaluronic Acid for Hydrated Skin, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic, 1 fl. oz
short_description: HYDRATING FACE SERUM: 1 fl. Oz. Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum provides intense hydration that leaves skin dewy, smooth, and refreshed.
HYALURONIC ACID SERUM: Face serum formulated with purified hyaluronic acid, a skin-identical hydrator that binds to water and locks in moisture for lasting skin softness.
LIGHTWEIGHT MOISTURE: Non-comedogenic and oil-free face serum absorbs quickly and won’t clog pores, making it ideal for layering under your moisturizer or makeup.
GENTLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: From a dermatologist-recommended brand, this hydrating face serum is suitable for dry, sensitive or combination skin.
COMPLETE THE ROUTINE: Use with Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel or Gel Cream for around the clock hydration and healthy-looking, glowing skin.
product_description: Hydrate and refresh dull, dry skin with Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum. This lightweight, oil-free facial serum quenches skin on contact and delivers long-lasting hydration for a supple, glowing complexion. Formulated with purified hyaluronic acid—a dermatologist-recognized hydrator naturally found in skin—this daily serum binds to water and locks in moisture to visibly smooth and soften the face and neck. The fast-absorbing, non-comedogenic formula won’t clog pores and layers beautifully under makeup or moisturizer. Infused with the signature clean Hydro Boost fragrance, it provides instant, refreshing hydration while helping to strengthen the skin’s natural moisture barrier. For best results, apply evenly to face and neck after cleansing and before moisturizer. Pair with other Neutrogena Hydro Boost products for a complete hydrating skincare routine.

name: It'S SKIN Hyaluronic Acid Moisture Cream, Hydrating & Firming Face Moisturizer for Dry to Combination Skin, Long-Lasting Hydration, Day & Night Cream 1.69 fl.oz
short_description: INTENSE MOISTURIZING FACIAL CREAM: It's Skin Hyaluronic Acid Moisture Cream is formulated to help you achieve the soft and nourished skin of dreams. Our facial moisturizer contains Hyaluronic Acid, a natural moisturizing element that maximizes your skin's moisture retention to keep it hydrated all day long.

VITAMIN & MINERAL RICH FORMULA: This nourishing face cream contains Blueberry Fruit Extract, Acerola Fruit Extract, and Castor Oil which are rich in antioxidants and vitamins to help fight free radicals and oxidative stress. Our moisturizing face cream nourishes the skin and gives it a healthy glow.

SOOTHING AND FIRMING FACE CARE: It's Skin hyaluronic acid hydrating face cream fortifies skin's strength to help improve radiance and elasticity. Our calming face cream also helps soothe sensitive and irritated skin and restores the vitality of damaged and matured skin by supplying it with ample nutrients.

STRENGTHENS THE MOISTURE BARRIER: This face cream for sensitive skin helps strengthens the skin moisture barrier to prevent water evaporation and keep the skin hydrated. Our lightweight face cream leaves your skin moisturized, leaving the skin feeling firmer and softer with a dewy appearance.

HOW TO USE: Apply an adequate amount of product to the face and gently massage over the face and neck with light circular motions. This cream is cruelty-free and does not contain chemicals like GMO, SLS, phthalates, or alcohol, making it ideal for all skin types, including dry and sensitive skin.

name: Advanced Clinicals Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer Body Cream W/Vitamin E | Hydrating Cream & Body Lotion For Women & Men To Help Improve Look of Wrinkles, Dry Skin, Crepey Looking Skin, 16OZ, 2-Pack
short_description: HYALURONIC ACID CREAM HYDRATES & VISIBLY PLUMPS DRY SKIN – This body cream provides hydration to visibly plump and smooth skin. It locks in essential moisture, leaving skin looking refreshed, supple, and rejuvenated. Formulated by cosmetic chemists for women and men looking to add in extra hydration to their skincare routine.

HYALURONIC ACID BODY LOTION WITH SQUALANE, ALGAE EXTRACT, & PANTHENOL (VITAMIN B5) – Helps refresh, and enhance the look of skin texture. This replenishing formula helps lock in moisture for hydration and visible skin softness to improve the appearance of wrinkles, uneven skin tone, fine lines, & rough skin texture.

HYDRATION FOR SOFT, SUPPLE LOOKING SKIN – This rich, velvety body moisturizer delivers a burst of moisture, leaving skin feeling smooth, soft, and refreshed. Rich like a body butter but without a greasy finish. Skin feels hydrated, smooth, and visibly hydrated. This Hyaluronic Acid body cream is for all over body including neck, arms, hands, thighs and legs.
FOR DRY, DEHYDRATED SKIN – Apply daily as needed to dry or damp skin, massaging until fully absorbed for optimal hydration. Ideal to use day and night as part of your beauty skin care routine.

SCIENCE-BACKED SKINCARE – Advanced Clinicals offers science-driven formulas featuring well known and proven ingredients. Formulated by our in-house R&D team, with over 25 years of skincare expertise, Advanced Clinicals products are dermatologist tested and formulated with your skincare goals in mind. Made in the Midwest with globally sourced materials.

name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, Daily Moisturizer, Oil-Free, Fragrance Free, Non-Comedogenic, 19 Ounce
short_description: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.
product_description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night. •Non-comedogenic •Fragrance-free •Oil-free •Hypoallergenic •Gentle, non-irritating formula •Suitable for sensitive skin Key Ingredients : • MVE Technology : This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration • Ceramides : Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier •Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture

short_description: POWERFUL HYDRATION BOOST: For a powerful boost of hydration to the face and luminous skin, this award-winning facial moisturizer does it all. It’s packed with skin-loving ingredients that even out skin tone and replenish lost moisture for a firmed up, bouncy complexion.

NOURISHES & PLUMPS SKIN: Key ingredients include Hyaluronic Acid to help moisturize for a plump complexion, Niacinamide to minimize pores & even out skin tone, Squalane to improve balance & elasticity, and Vitamin B5 to soothe & hydrate skin.
FOR EVERYONE: Good for normal, dry, combo and oily skin types.
USE DAY & NIGHT: Great for daytime and nighttime use, the non-greasy face cream quickly sinks into the skin for a smooth, super-soft feel.
VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE: e.l.f. stands with every eye, lip, face, paw and fin. Proudly vegan, e.l.f. is double-certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny & PETA.
product_description: The Holy Hydration! Face Cream is your secret weapon to a flawless face. It's packed with skin-loving ingredients to nourish your complexion. Hyaluronic Acid helps provide hydration by locking in moisture and reducing water loss. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) helps brighten and even out skin tone. Squalane helps improve moisture balance and elasticity. Peptides help promote collagen for a more refreshed complexion. This nourishing yet lightweight cream instantly sinks into the skin for a smooth, non-greasy feel and soft, supple skin. e.l.f. makes the best of beauty accessible to every eye, lip, and face. Your originality is infinite, and we are inspired by what makes you unique. From the early explorer to the trend-obsessed beauty junkie - glam or bare faced, minimalist, maximalist and every look in between - we are for every eye, lip, and face. Proud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide.

short_description: HYALURONIC HERO: This face gel moisturizer provides all-day hydration with hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and peptides
FRAGRANCE-FREE: Provides powerful results without added scent or sticky, greasy feel
FREE OF: parabens, mineral oils, phthalates, and dyes
DAY & NIGHT: Smooth evenly over cleansed face and neck both morning and night
NOW A BIGGER JAR: Value size jar lasts one week longer with intended day and night usage
product_description: Want healthier-looking skin? Olay Plump & Hydrate Hyaluronic Ultralight Gel leaves skin dewy and hydrated on Day 1. It has a fragrance-free, hydrating gel formula that feels smooth to apply and absorbs quickly. The hyaluronic acid moisturizer helps skin look smoother and firmer. Olay Hyaluronic’s dermatologist-tested ingredients are: Hyaluronic Acid Niacinamide (Vitamin B3+) Amino Peptides The formula regulates water within skin’s surface cells to keep it hydrated throughout the day. It aids in surface skin cell turnover and regeneration, and exfoliates to remove dull skin.There are no parabens, phthalates, or synthetic dyes. Plus, it’s fragrance-free. How to Use: 1. Cleanse your skin to remove dirt, oil, or makeup. And if you feel like you need a little oomph, try a scrub. 2. Treat your complexion concerns with skin-specific formulas like brightening serums, smoothing eye creams, or hydrating face mists. 3. Moisturize to protect your skin. Use Hyaluronic Ultralight Gel on face and neck both morning and night. It’s the same Olay you love with proven results. Now with recyclable packaging. Once you’ve enjoyed every last drop, just rinse it out. Then recycle the jar, lid, and shipping container. All product benefit claims were verified by internal studies by Olay in 2018 - 2022. The product formulas are based on decades of research to support the claimed benefits. Launched in August 2023.
